name: ScriptMenuActions
shortdesc: A collection of script menu actions.

parameter.name: title
parameter.shortdesc: The name of the ScriptMenuAction for display in the user interface. The title includes any ampersand characters &#40;&&#41;, which are used to tell the Windows OS to underline the following character in the name for use with the Alt key to navigate to a menu item. Double ampersands are used to display an actual ampersand character in the name. The Mac OS ignores and removes the extra ampersand characters. (Optional)

parameter.name: withProperties
parameter.shortdesc: Initial values for properties of the new ScriptMenuAction &#40;Optional)

method.name: count
method.shortdesc: Displays the number of elements in the ScriptMenuAction.

method.name: item
method.shortdesc: Returns the ScriptMenuAction with the specified index or name.

parameter.name: index
parameter.shortdesc: The index or name. Can accept: Long Integer or String.

method.name: itemByName
method.shortdesc: Returns the ScriptMenuAction with the specified name.

method.name: itemByID
method.shortdesc: Returns the ScriptMenuAction with the specified ID.

method.name: itemByRange
method.shortdesc: Returns the ScriptMenuActions within the specified range.

parameter.name: from
parameter.shortdesc: The ScriptMenuAction, index, or name at the beginning of the range. Can accept: ScriptMenuAction, Long Integer or String.

parameter.name: to
parameter.shortdesc: The ScriptMenuAction, index, or name at the end of the range. Can accept: ScriptMenuAction, Long Integer or String.

method.name: firstItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the first ScriptMenuAction in the collection.

method.name: lastItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the last ScriptMenuAction in the collection.

method.name: middleItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the middle ScriptMenuAction in the collection.

method.name: previousItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the ScriptMenuAction with the index previous to the specified index.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The index of the ScriptMenuAction that follows the desired ScriptMenuAction.

method.name: nextItem
method.shortdesc: Returns the ScriptMenuAction whose index follows the specified ScriptMenuAction in the collection.

parameter.name: obj
parameter.shortdesc: The ScriptMenuAction whose index comes before the desired ScriptMenuAction.

method.name: anyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns any ScriptMenuAction in the collection.

method.name: everyItem
method.shortdesc: Returns every ScriptMenuAction in the collection.

method.name: toSource
method.shortdesc: Generates a string which, if executed, will return the ScriptMenuAction.
Returns the ScriptMenuAction with the specified index.

property.name: length
property.shortdesc: The number of objects in the collection.
